item.title: Fintech VC Funding Dips Sharply In Q2 2016
item.description:
Fintech VC Funding Dips Sharply In Q2 2016

Over the past few years, there has been a significant growth in C funding for the fintech sector. Bitcoin and blockchain companies have seen their fair share of investment capital as well. But a new study by CB Insights seems to indicate the VC funding space is hitting the proverbial glass ceiling.

item.title: No title
How is the divisibility of Bitcoin useful?
item.description:
How is the divisibility of Bitcoin useful?

Answer: If (still a huge if) a bitcoin (BTC) goes up in value tremendously (e.g. $100,000/BTC) you'd want to subdivide a coin to buy something less than the full value of a BTC. Also, subdividing a BTC allows for fees to be collected by the validating nodes a.k.a. miners.

item.title: Can you build a PayPal-like electronic balance system on top of a sidechain connected to the bitcoin blockchain?
item.description:
Can you build a PayPal-like electronic balance system on top of a sidechain connected to the bitcoin blockchain?

Answer (1 of 2): Yes, through the blockchain API this ability is available also it is worth noting that PayPal and coinbase actually does just this, however, if you are looking for an alternate service provider this model would work as well but would take many dollars to build out and support.

item.title: Aten Coin's NAC Offers Support for US Blockchain Bill
item.description:
Aten Coin's NAC Offers Support for US Blockchain Bill

NAC, the organization behind the "first-generation compliant digital currency" Aten Coin, has come out in support of the recent United States House Resolution 835, which proposes national policy to promote "alternative non-fiat currencies." This article was provided by Bitcoin PR Buzz.

item.title: PSA: Full nodes should run a tor hidden service, it costs nothing and improves the network * /r/Bitcoin
item.description:
PSA: Full nodes should run a tor hidden service, it costs nothing and improves the network * /r/Bitcoin

Right now there are only 129 nodes available through their own tor hidden services: https://bitnodes.21.co/nodes/?q=.onion Since Core 0.12...

item.title: Jaxx to Support the 7th Largest Cryptocurrency, DASH Soon - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Jaxx to Support the 7th Largest Cryptocurrency, DASH Soon - NEWSBTC

Jaxx multi-platform cryptocurrency wallet will soon support Dash alongside Bitcoin, Ethereum, and DAO soon. Read more... Jaxx cryptocurrency wallet users now have another reason to rejoice. The online wallet service provider has recently announced that it will include support for Dash on iPhone. Jaxx, created by Decentral Inc.

item.title: Bank Insider: Cryptofinance Will Not Be the End of Wall Street
item.description:
Bank Insider: Cryptofinance Will Not Be the End of Wall Street

Finance and banking has seen its fair share of innovation over the centuries, and Bitcoin and its blockchain technology are already making a new chapter in this history. To get a better sense of how the industry views this innovation, I interviewed the head of Technology Risk for the Wealth & Investment Management portion of Wells Fargo Bank, Jimmie Lenz.
